summary: Successfully completed 5 commits. Committed 5 file change(s)

commits.message:
chore(config): update last run log after execution

Updated .kcmt/last_run.json to reflect a successful run processing 1
file, reducing counts from previous 7 to 1, with updated timestamp,
duration, rate, and summary. This captures the latest execution stats
and replaces the commits array with the single successful commit for
this log file.
feat(llm): add provider-specific default request timeout

feat(anthropic): use default request timeout resolution

Update AnthropicDriver to use resolve_default_request_timeout from base
module instead of hardcoded 5.0 seconds. This allows for provider-
specific timeout defaults, improving configurability and consistency
across LLM providers.

feat(providers): add default timeouts for providers

Introduce DEFAULT_PROVIDER_TIMEOUTS dict with predefined timeout values
for openai (5.0s), github (5.0s), xai (12.0s), and anthropic (12.0s).
Add resolve_default_request_timeout function to retrieve the timeout for
a given provider, defaulting to 5.0s if not specified or unknown. This
improves handling of varying response times across providers.

feat(providers): add dynamic default request timeout resolution

Previously, the OpenAI driver hardcoded the default request timeout to
5.0 seconds. Now, it uses the resolve_default_request_timeout function
to determine the default based on the provider, allowing for more
flexible timeout handling.

subjects: chore(config): update last run log after execution
feat(llm): add provider-specific default request timeout
feat(anthropic): use default request timeout resolution
feat(providers): add default timeouts for providers
feat(providers): add dynamic default request timeout resolution
